import React, { useState } from "react"; import googleLogo from "../assets/googlemain.png"; import Axios from "axios"; const Signupform = () => { const url = "http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/user/register"; const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ // Initialize form fields fullname: "", email: "", address: "", company: "", password: "", confirm_password: "", }); function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); // Call a function to send data to the database/API Axios.post(url, { fullname: formData.fullname, email: formData.email, address: formData.address, company: formData.company, password: formData.password, confirm_password: formData.confirm_password, }).then((res) => { // console.log(res.formData); console.log("data sent"); }); } const handleChange = (e) => { // Update form data when input changes const newData = { ...formData }; newData[e.target.name] = e.target.value; setFormData(newData); console.log(newData); }; return (
{/* Sign up form for Customers Only*/}
{/* Sign up form header*/}

Sign Up as User

{/* Sign up form*/}
handleSubmit(e)} >
{/* Content below form*/}

Already have an account? Log In

); }; export default Signupform;
